body: This is kind of an oldie, isn't it? I saw the Comaku tag and thought "hey, maybe she did a side project" and then saw that I'd read that story translated on Yurism ages ago. Either way, IIRC Comaku's gone mainsteam IIRC. Might be the best thing for her - her artwork and setup for H stuff has always been great, and I love her kinks, but the scenes themselves have always been lacking.
